patthana24.17:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo
patthana24.17:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetu
patthana24.17:1.1_2: ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke
patthana24.17:2.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu
patthana24.17:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana24.17:2.1_2: saraṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
